packages.name: American Embedded Library
packages.description: Symbols and footprints for common components used in American Embedded designs
packages.description_full: A curated library of KiCad symbols and footprints maintained by American Embedded. Includes USB connectors, common ICs, and custom components with consistent styling and verified footprints generated from parametric YAML configurations.

packages.name: Via Stitcher
packages.description: Automated via stitching and trace fencing for KiCad
packages.description_full:
A powerful via stitching plugin for KiCad with Altium-style features:

- Zone Fill Mode: Fill copper zones with a grid pattern of vias
- Zone Fence Mode: Place vias around zone perimeters
- Trace Fence Mode: Shield selected traces with parallel via fences

Features:
- Configurable via size, spacing, and clearances
- Staggered or grid patterns with optional random offset
- Path-based trace fencing with smooth corner handling
- Collision detection with pads, tracks, vias, and rule areas
- Support for rounded rectangle board outlines
- Auto-preview with real-time feedback

packages.name: American Embedded Dark Theme
packages.description: Dark color theme for KiCad with American Embedded branding
packages.description_full: A professionally designed dark color theme for KiCad featuring American Embedded's brand colors. Provides comfortable viewing for extended design sessions with carefully chosen contrast ratios for all editors including schematic, PCB, footprint editor, and 3D viewer.

packages.name: American Embedded Light Theme
packages.description: Light color theme for KiCad with American Embedded branding
packages.description_full: A professionally designed light color theme for KiCad featuring American Embedded's brand colors. Ideal for well-lit environments with carefully chosen contrast ratios for all editors including schematic, PCB, footprint editor, and 3D viewer.
